function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Knowledge extraction and fusion process involving human input may introduce errors and biases into the OpenKG-COVID19.","Impact":"Inaccurate or biased information in the OpenKG-COVID19 could lead to incorrect conclusions or recommendations regarding COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous validation and quality control processes for knowledge extraction. Use machine learning algorithms to reduce human biases.","Technologies":"Machine learning algorithms for data validation and quality control.","People":"Researchers, data scientists, and developers involved in knowledge extraction and fusion.","Owner":"Research institutions and organizations leading the development of OpenKG-COVID19."},{"Description":"Inadequate protection and public preventive guidance in the prevention KG may result in the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and potential outbreaks due to inadequate preventive guidance.","Mitigation":"Ensure the guidance provided in the prevention KG aligns with official public health recommendations. Regularly update the information based on current guidelines.","Technologies":"Data analytics and real-time monitoring of public health recommendations.","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, and individuals seeking preventive guidance.","Owner":"Public health organizations and government agencies responsible for maintaining preventive guidance."},{"Description":"Inaccurate or incomplete information in the medical and health KGs may lead to misinformed treatment decisions for COVID-19.","Impact":"Patients may receive incorrect treatment or medication due to the reliance on inaccurate or incomplete data.","Mitigation":"Regularly verify the accuracy of data sources and integrate information from reputable medical institutions and organizations. Implement data validation checks and expert review processes.","Technologies":"Blockchain for data integrity, data validation algorithms, and expert review systems.","People":"Healthcare professionals, medical researchers, and individuals seeking medical information.","Owner":"Medical institutions and organizations responsible for managing medical and health data."}]}
